label: minimumValueMeasure
comment: A measure of a minimum value for this sustainability characteristic.
The measure of the lowest value of a range for this specified temperature, such as a minimum temperature value of four degrees Celsius.
The measure of the lowest value of this transport setting temperature, such as a minimum temperature value of four degrees Celsius.
The measure of the minimum value for this process characteristic.
The measure of the minimum value for this specified range.
The measure of the minimum value of this instructed temperature.

domainIncludes.comment: Temperature settings instructed for storage or movement of goods.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a process.
A row, line or series, commonly used to express the difference between lowest and highest values.
A specified temperature value or range of values.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
Temperature settings for a transport movement, such as a required storage temperature range.
